attributes.action: actively discourage the FA Premiership from playing any league games abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Football League was formed in 1888 on the simple principle of all teams playing each other home and away.It has a perfect and balanced symmetry which has been replicated throughout the world and at all levels of the beautiful game.This simple and sound system has become embedded in British sporting culture.In recent years,the feeling has grown that the game is being taken away from ordinary fans through greed and money.We say enough is enough!Supporters will put up with almost anything,because we cannot take our custom elsewhere to another club.To geographically move some of our sporting experience out of the Country is,in a very physical sense,  stealing our clubs away from us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
